name: Sky High (Antoine Nisoli, MagalieB, YannickE, Patrickode)
name_original: Sky High (Antoine Nisoli, MagalieB, YannickE, Patrickode)
description:
SkyHigh is a little management game which make you play as the mayor of a small floating island. Your goal is to do your best to amplify the visibility of the minorities in your city. For that, you can build buildings, earn money and do Charity Actions in order to increase your statistics. But random events can happen and make you face some challenges...

SkyHigh has been made for the Game For Change Cross Cultural Impact Jam by team SkyLink, composed of 4 students :

  • Patrick Mitchell : Design, Developer
  • Antoine Nisoli : Design, Lead Developer, VFX
  • Magalie Bergeron : 3D and 2D Art
  • Yannick Engozo’o : Design, 3D Art
